CustomField.description:
This field stores the fixed payment amount that is applicable when the "LOC Payment Type" has the following picklist values
1) Fixed Amount Plus Accrued Interest 2) Fixed Amount 3) Fixed Amount per $1000 of Outstanding Balance 4) Percentage of the Outstanding Balance Plus Accrued Interest 5) Greater of Fixed Amount or Accrued Interest
CustomField.label: LOC Fixed Payment Amount
